alert.note: Alert for Penobscot; Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:31PM EDT until July 12 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL PISCATAQUIS AND NORTH CENTRAL PENOBSCOT COUNTIES... At 630 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Shin Pond to Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument to 12 miles south of Mount Katahdin to 10 miles northeast of White Cap Mountain, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Millinocket, Patten, Mount Chase, Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument, Shin Pond, Baxter State Park, Stacyville, Grindstone and Katahdin Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
